title: Mystery Pumpkin Font
content:
Two nights ago my wife and I carved some pumpkins with our little one. Even though [|this type battle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200640/http:/typophile.com/battle19) was long past, I decided to render our house number in the style of a particular font. I did it freehand, and with admittedly poor tools (and then took blurry images of it!), but I think it came out passably enough that someone should be able to ID it.

Any takers? (BTW, this is solely for my own validation as a pumpkin carver.)

I'll also admit that the kerning is kind of off :(

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200640im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12943_526106691436_62500461_31179106_7154569_n_5623.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200640im_/http:/typophile.com/files/12943_526106696426_62500461_31179107_1622278_n_6680.jpg)
author: Ehague
